comment.author: 49503155381@N01
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Feminist Art & Documentary, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: hey there, I added a bunch from our Elizabeth A. Sacker Center for Feminist Art.  Let me know if you don't want that many in the group and I'll subtract some.  Sometimes group admins want a lot and others want just a few...just let me know.  -shelley
